Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Joint Investigation Headquarters here. Confirmed no sighting of Ayla around the dorm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Are you sure you want to call it that? It sounds like a mouthful to say.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I think it sounds okay, but if you find it too long... Hold on, I'm seeing the guys from WGAA collecting people's cards.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'm going to get every last one of them!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hi, excuse me. Do you have a moment? See...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the blink of an eye, Nanami manages to stop the gang from WGAA.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Any update?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Nope. Negative!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Negative, huh... Well, keep looking, then. I just need to make a few quick calls now.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Roger that!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Joint Investigation Headquarters here calling Agent Kamui.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory267.png', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Capt... Ahem, I mean, yes, Agent Kamui speaking.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Any update from you, Agent Kamui?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Well... I don't know if this is worth mentioning at all... but I feel like I've been followed around.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui turns around—and sees the white silhouette that disappears in the blink of an eye.'}
{3: 'No. 21 and Co-Bot stand right around the corner. Pressing her index finger to her lips, No. 21 gestures for Co-Bot to stay quiet.'}
{3: 'Then, poking her head out from the corner, she trains her eye again at Kamui.'}
{3: "Kamui turns around again hoping to see who's behind him—but sees nothing except for the white silhouette that once again disappears in the blink of an eye."}
{3: 'Repeating what they do, Kamui and No. 21 gradually form an electrical circuit where the light bulb is turned on and then off repeatedly as the switch is flipped.'}
{3: 'When Kamui turns around, No. 21 moves back to her side of the corner; when Kamui turns the other way again, No. 21 emerges from around the corner.'}
{3: 'Then, Kamui turns his head around twice in a row—stopping the seemingly endless loop.'}
{3: "Kamui doesn't see No. 21. He does, however, see Co-Bot, which is just standing there not doing anything."}
{3: 'Then, a hand appears from around the corner and pulls it away.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory122.png', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'I have the distinct feeling that Cerberus has their eyes on the letter in question now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How in the world did they even catch wind of that, though...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'There is probably someone out there making the whole situation known.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Anyhow, we should try to get our hands on it before anyone else does. You probably want to hurry up now, Kamui...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory266.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Welcome to the Joint Investigation Headquarters. You'll be in charge of that area over there!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kurono Construct', 3: 'No problem.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kurono Construct', 3: 'Have you tried to get more people involved in this by any chance?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Of course. Together we're strong, right?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I came across Vera, Yata, Simon, and a whole bunch of other people along the way, and we really have the festival to thank...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'If you ever run into people you know, can you ask them to give us a hand, too?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kurono Construct', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "I'll be on my way, then.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "And remember to give the letter to me when you find it. Don't open it yourself.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The Construct keeps its eye on Nanami—until she's completely out of sight. Then, the Construct turns on his own terminal."}

{2: 'Kurono Construct', 3: "The Gray Raven Commandant has sent out all these people to look for some letter without the knowledge of the higher-ups. There seems to be more than meets the eye, and I'm going to look into it now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kurono Construct', 3: '...Hey, what are you doing back here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oh. My. God. Just heard from Headquarters that some evil people have their eyes on the letter now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "The maintenance tunnel. Let's see... You wouldn't happen to know where the closest maintenance tunnel is, would you?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png'}
{3: 'With the infinite universe itself as their backdrop, the Engineering Force is afloat around Babylonia maintaining its home with all sorts of tools.'}
{3: "Looking out into the universe, a man from the Engineering Force finds the world quieter than usual. He can't help but wonder if it's because it's the Mid-Autumn Festival today."}
{3: 'Taking advantage of his break time, he opens his coffee can as he looks into the universe.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member From the Engineering Force', 3: "It's so quiet and I don't see the Punishing Virus here. It's so different from what it's like on Earth.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'PheeEEeeeewWWW—!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A gigantic being swooshes past with a girl sitting on top.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Standing in bewilderment for a few seconds, everyone in the crew shakes their head in unison, apparently trying to forget what they just saw.'}
{2: 'Member From the Engineering Force', 3: 'Oh boy, who am I to slack off when everyone is hard at work?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'PheeEEeeeewWWW—!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A gigantic being swooshes past with a girl sitting on top.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member From the Engineering Force', 3: '...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Member From the Engineering Force', 3: 'Sorry, but is this some sort of rehearsal?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, it isn't. I was just looking for the entrance to the pad. Would you happen to know where it went?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man points behind himself.'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Oh, right behind the drone, eh? No wonder I didn't see it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Alright, Power. Speed up!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And with it, the gigantic being swooshes past the man again.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The man slowly raises his coffee can and, with the device at the end of the can, tries to push the weightless coffee into his mouth...'}
{3: 'BANG, BANG, BOOM—loud bangs come from the other side of the line.'}
{3: 'And with it, the man splashes the coffee straight onto his own face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Oops! Sorry, but I just knocked down a few things here...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Guess I'll just leave them here, then? Now, Power. Ready, set, go!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Waving the coffee away from his face, the man gazes long and hard at the deep sky.'}
{3: 'Then, sealing the can, he decides to get back to work ahead of schedule.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory529.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Power falls through the skylight before the door is pushed open.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Nanami?! That was fast! How did you do that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Hehe, I came here full-throttle around Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The other doors are opened one by one.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Has anyone found the letter?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'People arrive one after another, eventually bringing Gray Raven together again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'WGAA Member', 3: 'Might I ask who you all are?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "We're the Joint Investigation Headquarters!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Seeing Power coming right up, the WGAA member raises both their hands in surrender.'}
{3: "Knowing what's going to happen next, Lucia and Liv rush up to get Nanami off Power."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Wait, didn't you say...", 4: '1'}
{3: "The three carry on with their conversation until the pose of the WGAA member—which he's been keeping up for quite some time now—turns into what appears to be a complimenting gesture."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, uhm, she was just kidding, sir.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "We just wanted to ask you to see if you'd seen Ayla back here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: "Ayla, huh... Well... I've been here for the entire day today, but I don't remember seeing her at all.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Would you happen to know where she put all the cards she's been going around collecting?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: "She left them all in the Temporary Archives Center... And speaking of which, a member from Ayla's team applied for an Earth-bound transport craft a while back.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: 'And Ayla wanted to take all the cards with her on her trip to Earth so she could go through them on the way. Guess she has a little too much on her plate these days.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What's the craft's ID, if you don't mind?", 4: '1'}
{3: "With a few taps on his own terminal, the WGAA member sends the craft's ID to Lee."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Let's see... Doesn't seem like we'll ever catch them in time. Could you ask the guys at the pad to let us know when Ayla and the crew are back?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are we going back to prep the mooncake ingredients?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Hey, I've collected all of them already. I stored them away somewhere, though, because I knew we'd be out on this mission here.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'I marked it down on a map, but let me try to dig out the map first...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Yes? Is there anything else you'd like to share?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: "It's not anything important, but...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: 'I did come across a male Construct that asked me about Ayla and the cards, too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'A male Construct? What does it look like?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: 'Well... His hair is pink, and he looks quite sturdy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'WGAA Member', 3: "And the way he smiles is very unusual... It's almost like looking at a great white shark smiling at me.", 4: '2'}
